text: == Events == * March 16 – Battle of Boroughbridge, where Edward II of England beats Thomas, Earl of Lancaster * September 27/September 28 – Battle of Ampfing, often called the last battle of knights, when Louis IV, Holy Roman Emperor beats Frederick I of Austria == Births == * January 11 – Emperor Komyo of Japan (died 1380) * June 24 – Joanna, Duchess of Brabant (died 1406) == Deaths == * January 3 – King Philip V of France (born 1293)
